main.name: Antonios Lampros
main.description: Experienced engineer with a focus on cloud Development
main.bio: Holder of Bsc degree in accounting & finance from the University of Patras, looking for a change in career towards web development. I am interested in front end desing using the React framework and also i plan to deploy my own applications with Node to update my skills with Javascript. Lastly i am interest in cloud technology and how it can relate to efficiency to deploy my own apps.

education.description: Holder of B' class license from the Economic chamber of Greece

work.title: Junior Auditor
work.description: Junior auditor tasked with auditing SME's from the start of the audit with the testing of the trial balance, locating invoices and finally drafting the financial statements according with IFRS for the senior auditor in charge.

work.title: Accounting and finance intern
work.description: Internship at the Dealing room sector, tasked with maintaining and updating special accounts for any sales to or from the dealing room.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
